Package Tarot

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actions
    This class initialize and modifies the Reading view and define event handlers for the objects.
    ButtonAction  
    Card
    This class is used to create two types of cards a major card and a minor card.
    Main
    This class initialize and modifies the Main view and define event handlers for the objects.
    MajorCard
    This class is a concrete implementation of the Card class it adds a cardMessage object, that is unique to Major cards
    Menu
    This class initialize and modifies the Deck view .
    MinorCard
    This class is a concrete implementation of the Card class it adds a cardDomain object, that is unique to minor cards
    Tarot
    This class creates a tarot deck using the a List/ArrayList as a data structure to store all the cards .
    TarotCards
    This class creates a tarot deck using the a List/ArrayList as a data structure to store all the cards .
    Window
    This class initialize and modifies the Main view and define event handlers for the objects.
